dublin_core.dcvalue: The mHealth for Integrated Community Case Management application is used by community health workers in Malawi as a village register, a supervisory tool, and a link to the logistics management system.
Community health worker or volunteer, Civil society organization, Facility, Public sector health system (national, regional, district)
Steve Ollis, Chief Operating Officer, D-tree International, sollis@d-tree.org; Eric Saforo, Country Director, D-tree International â€“ Malawi esaforo@d-tree.org
Six districts in Malawi: Dedza, Mzimba North, Ntcheu, Ntchisi, Dowa, and Machinga

Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Electronic health records, Provider work planning and scheduling, Registries and vital events tracking, Supply chain management, Child health, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases, Maternal health, Newborn heath, Primary Care
